@notice Make a bet.

@notice This function allows anyone to check their winnings.
 @return The winning amount of the msg.sender if it exists.

checkOutcome(bytes32).details: This function allows anyone to check the amount already betted per outcome.

params.outcome: The hash of the outcome to be checked.

returns._0: The amount betted for the given outcome.

checkOutcomeString(string).details: It uses the `keccak256` hash function to get the hash of the `outcomeString`

params.outcomeString: The string representation of the outcome to be checked.

returns._0: The amount betted for the given outcome.
The winning amount of the msg.sender if it exists.

params.newOracle: The address of the new oracle.

params.outcome: The hash of the outcome to bet on.

checkOutcomeString(string).notice: This function is similar to `checkOutcome` but it receives the outcome as string.

checkWinnings().notice: This function allows anyone to check their winnings.

chooseOracle(address).notice: This function allows owner to chooses their trusted Oracle.

withdraw(uint256).notice: This function allows the winners to withdraw their winnings safely (if they win something).
